```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)   
library(janeaustenr) 
library(stringr)
library(wordcloud)  
```

```{r}
austen <- austen_books()
austen
```

```{r}
emma_data <- austen %>%
  filter(book == "Emma")

#emma_data
chapter_data <- emma_data %>% 
  mutate(linenumber = row_number(),
         chapter = cumsum(str_detect(text, regex("^chapter\\s+\\d+\\b"))))


chapter_data
```
